scripts.watchTS: dotnet fable watch ../Euclid.fsproj --lang typescript          --outDir ./_ts --run npm run checkTS
scripts.buildTS: dotnet fable       ../Euclid.fsproj --lang typescript --silent --outDir ./_ts --configuration Release --run npm run checkTS
scripts.pretest: npm i && dotnet tool restore && npm run buildJS && npm run buildDb && npm run buildTS
